description: Numbers n such that the largest power of 2 dividing n equals 2^omega(n).
comments: That is, numbers such that A001221(n) is equal to A007814(n).omega(n) = A001221(n) is the number of distinct primes dividing n.And A007814(n) is the exponent of the highest power of 2 dividing n.
example: omega(12)=2 and 4=2^2 is the largest power of 2 dividing 12, hence 12 is in the sequence.
author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Sep 04 2002
